original: gang zag ni ko ka li ka dang / khanda dra bya dang / ka ti mo ra ka ti shya dang / rgya mtshos byin /
analyzed: gang zag ni ko ka li ka dang / khanda dra bya dang / ka ti mo ra ka ti shya dang / rgya mtshos byin /
translated: The individuals are Kokālika, Kaṭamorakatiṣya, Kaṭa, and Ghaṭikāra.

original: nyon mongs pa ni dbyen byed par 'dod pa /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ni dbyen byed par 'dod pa /
translated: The affliction is the desire to cause a schism.

original: nyes pa ni de'i rjes su phyogs pa'o //
analyzed: nyes pa ni de'i rjes su phyogs pa'o //
translated: The fault is to side with them.

original: de la dge slong de'i zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la dge slong de'i zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In this regard, “that monk”

original: lhas byin gyi'o //
analyzed: lhas byin gyi'o //
translated: refers to Devadatta.

original: grogs byed pa'i dge slong zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: grogs byed pa'i dge slong zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “The monk who assists him”

original: ko ka li ka dang / khanda dra bya dang / ka ti mo ra ka ti shya dang / rgya mtshos byin dag go //
analyzed: ko ka li ka dang / khanda dra bya dang / ka ti mo ra ka ti shya dang / rgya mtshos byin dag go //
translated: refers to Kokālika, Kaṭamorakatiṣya, Kaṭa, and Ghaṭikāra.

original: mi mthun par smra ba nyid kyi rjes su phyogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mi mthun par smra ba nyid kyi rjes su phyogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “To side with those who speak in opposition”

original: lta ba de dag dang / 'dod pa de dag dang / bsam pa de dag dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: lta ba de dag dang / 'dod pa de dag dang / bsam pa de dag dang ldan pa'o //
translated: means to have those views, to have those desires, and to have those thoughts.

original: gcig gam gnyis sam mang po dag yod cing zhes bya ba ni grangs su rung ba ste ;
analyzed: gcig gam gnyis sam mang po dag yod cing zhes bya ba ni grangs su rung ba ste ;
translated: “One, two, or many” means to be countable.

original: gnyis las lhag pa ni mang po'o //
analyzed: gnyis las lhag pa ni mang po'o //
translated: More than two is “many.”

original: gal te de dag ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: gal te de dag ces bya ba ni /
translated: “If they”

original: rjes su phyogs pa de dag go //
analyzed: rjes su phyogs pa de dag go //
translated: refers to those who side with them.

original: dge slong rnams la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dge slong rnams la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The monks means

original: chos 'di pa rnams la'o //
analyzed: chos 'di pa rnams la'o //
translated: those who are Dharma practitioners.

original: 'di slad ces zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di slad ces zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase for this reason means🔽that one should say this in a way that is in accord with the Dharma.

original: rjes su phyogs pa'i tshig 'di skad ces zer na'o //🔽tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rjes su phyogs pa'i tshig 'di skad ces zer na'o // tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase venerable ones, you should not means

original: dge ba la sbyor bar yang ma byed cig ces pa'o //🔽sdig kyang rung zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dge ba la sbyor bar yang ma byed cig ces pa'o // sdig kyang rung zhes bya ba ni /
translated: that one should not engage in what is virtuous.🔽The phrase you should not means

original: sdig pa las zlog par yang ma byed cig ces pa'o //
analyzed: sdig pa las zlog par yang ma byed cig ces pa'o //
translated: that one should not turn away from what is nonvirtuous.

original: dge slong 'di la zhes bya ba ni lhas byin la'o //🔽ci yang ma smra shig ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: dge slong 'di la zhes bya ba ni lhas byin la'o // ci yang ma smra shig ces bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase this monk refers to Devadatta.🔽The phrase say anything at all means

original: cung zad ma smra shig pa'o //
analyzed: cung zad ma smra shig pa'o //
translated: that one should not say anything.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba 'dul ba smra ba'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba 'dul ba smra ba'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: The phrase this venerable monk is a proponent of the Dharma and a proponent of the Vinaya means

original: chos smra ba zhes bya ba ni rigs pa smra ba'o //
analyzed: chos smra ba zhes bya ba ni rigs pa smra ba'o //
translated: that he is a proponent of the Dharma in the sense that he speaks in a way that is correct.

original: 'dul ba smra ba zhes bya ba ni lung gi rjes su 'brang ba'o //
analyzed: 'dul ba smra ba zhes bya ba ni lung gi rjes su 'brang ba'o //
translated: He is a proponent of the Vinaya in the sense that he follows the scriptures.

original: gzhan yang chos ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las /
analyzed: gzhan yang chos ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las /
translated: Moreover, the Dharma is the eightfold noble path.

original: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: It consists of right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right concentration.

original: 'dul ba ni yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o //
analyzed: 'dul ba ni yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o //
translated: The Vinaya is right speech, right action, and right livelihood.

original: gzhan yang chos smra ba ni don dang ldan par smra ba'o //🔽'dul ba ni 'jam @69a * //
analyzed: gzhan yang chos smra ba ni don dang ldan par smra ba'o // 'dul ba ni 'jam @69a * //
translated: Moreover, the Dharma is that which is spoken with meaning.

original: zhing mdza' ba ltar ro //
analyzed: zhing mdza' ba ltar ro //
translated: The Vinaya is that which is spoken gently and lovingly.

original: de yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams kyis bsngags par zad kyi /
analyzed: de yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams kyis bsngags par zad kyi /
translated: Moreover, the Dharma is that which is praised by those who are spiritually advanced.

original: lhas byin nyid de dang ldan pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: lhas byin nyid de dang ldan pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But Devadatta is not endowed with that.

original: dge slong 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par rab tu blangs nas bzung ste /
analyzed: dge slong 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par rab tu blangs nas bzung ste /
translated: This monk has taken up the Dharma and Vinaya and upholds it.

original: rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni //
translated: He uses conventional terms in accordance with it.

original: chos ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba dang / ston pa'i bstan pa ji lta ba de ltar rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa ste /
analyzed: chos ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba dang / ston pa'i bstan pa ji lta ba de ltar rjes su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa ste /
translated: He is one who makes conventional expressions in accordance with the Dharma, in accordance with the Vinaya, and in accordance with the Teacher’s doctrine.

original: yang dag par blangs nas zhes bya ba ni de la dmigs nas so //🔽rab tu bzung ste zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yang dag par blangs nas zhes bya ba ni de la dmigs nas so // rab tu bzung ste zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Having accepted it means having taken it as the object.🔽Having grasped it means

original: dam du bzung ste zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dam du bzung ste zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: having taken it firmly.

original: dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i /
analyzed: dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i /
translated: This monk speaks with full awareness,

original: mi shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mi shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba ni /
translated: not without full awareness.

original: don rtogs pa yin gyi don ma rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don rtogs pa yin gyi don ma rtogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This means that he has understood the meaning, not that he has not understood the meaning.

original: dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes smra na zhes bya ba ni /🔽dge slong lha sbyin 'di gzhi gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes zer na ste /
analyzed: dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes smra na zhes bya ba ni / dge slong lha sbyin 'di gzhi gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do zhes zer na ste /
translated: If they say, “We also accept and approve of what this monk accepts and approves of,”

original: 'dod cing zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dod cing zhes bya ba ni /
translated: this means that they say, “We also accept and approve of whatever this monk, Devadatta, accepts and approves of.”🔽Accept means

original: yid dang mthun pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: yid dang mthun pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: to agree with the mind.

original: bzod pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bzod pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Patience” is

original: rigs pas rtogs pa'i sgo nas te /
analyzed: rigs pas rtogs pa'i sgo nas te /
translated: through the door of understanding through reasoning.

original: re zhig de dag ni rjes su phyogs pa'i tshig yin no //
analyzed: re zhig de dag ni rjes su phyogs pa'i tshig yin no //
translated: These are the words of agreement.

original: dge slong de dag la zhes bab ni /
analyzed: dge slong de dag la zhes bab ni /
translated: “Those monks” refers to

original: ko ka li ka dang / khanda dra bya dang / ka ti ma ra ka ti shya dang / rgya mtshos byin dag la'o //
analyzed: ko ka li ka dang / khanda dra bya dang / ka ti ma ra ka ti shya dang / rgya mtshos byin dag la'o //
translated: Kokālika, Kaṭamorakatiṣya, Kaṭa, and Sthūlanandana.🔽“The monks” refers to

original: dge slong rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa rnams kyis so //
translated: those who are Dharma practitioners.

original: 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung /🔽dge slong 'di la ci yang ma smra shig ces bya ba la sogs par bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung / dge slong 'di la ci yang ma smra shig ces bya ba la sogs par bzhams te bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: “Venerable ones, you should not say anything, whether good or bad,🔽to this monk.”

original: dge slong de dag la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na zhes bya ba ni bzhams te bsgo ba de skad ces bsgo ba na'o //
analyzed: dge slong de dag la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgo ba na zhes bya ba ni bzhams te bsgo ba de skad ces bsgo ba na'o //
translated: “If the monks tell those monks this,” means if they tell them in this way,

original: gal te gzhi de gtong na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gal te gzhi de gtong na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “If he gives up that basis,” means

original: gal te lta ba de yongs su gtong na'o //
analyzed: gal te lta ba de yongs su gtong na'o //
translated: if he gives up that view.

original: de lta na legs zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de lta na legs zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “In that case it is good,” means

original: de ltar na bzang ba ste /
analyzed: de ltar na bzang ba ste /
translated: Thus, it is good.

original: rtsom pa'i nyes byas gcig byung bar zad kyi nyes pa sgom po yang ma byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtsom pa'i nyes byas gcig byung bar zad kyi nyes pa sgom po yang ma byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: There is only one offense of wrong conduct for beginning, and there is no offense of emulating.🔽If he does not give up,

original: gal te mi gtong na zhes bya ba ni gzhi de yongs su mi gtong na ste /
analyzed: gal te mi gtong na zhes bya ba ni gzhi de yongs su mi gtong na ste /
translated: if he does not give up that basis,

original: de ltar bzhams te bsgo ba mi gtong na rtsom pa la nyes byas gcig dang / bzhams te bsgo ba ma btang ba'i mthar nyes pa sbom po gcig kyang 'byung @69b ngo ;
analyzed: de ltar bzhams te bsgo ba mi gtong na rtsom pa la nyes byas gcig dang / bzhams te bsgo ba ma btang ba'i mthar nyes pa sbom po gcig kyang 'byung @69b ngo ;
translated: then if he does not give up the admonishment, there is one offense of wrong conduct for beginning, and also one offense of wrongdoing for not giving up when admonished three times.

original: gzhi de gtang bar bya ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya /
analyzed: gzhi de gtang bar bya ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo bar bya /
translated: In order to give up that basis, he should be admonished a second and a third time.

original: yang dag par bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yang dag par bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He should be properly admonished.

original: gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bya ba'o //
translated: He should be admonished by means of a legal procedure of announcement in the midst of a saṅgha.

original: lan gnyis lan gsum du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lan gnyis lan gsum du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: A second and a third time means

original: gsol ba gcig dang las brjod pa gsum du bya ba'o //
analyzed: gsol ba gcig dang las brjod pa gsum du bya ba'o //
translated: that he should be admonished once and the action that is to be done three times.

original: yang dag par bsgo /
analyzed: yang dag par bsgo /
translated: He should be properly admonished.

original: yang dag par bstan pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: yang dag par bstan pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Proper admonition is as before.

original: lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo yang dag par bstan pa na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs zhes bya ba ni de lta na bzang ba ste /
analyzed: lan gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo yang dag par bstan pa na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs zhes bya ba ni de lta na bzang ba ste /
translated: If he gives up that basis when corrected and instructed a second and a third time, then all is well.

original: dge 'dun lhag ma'i dngos gzhi'i ltung ba ma byung ba'i phyir ro//🔽sngar ni sbyor ba brtsams pa la nyes byas gcig go //
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma'i dngos gzhi'i ltung ba ma byung ba'i phyir ro// sngar ni sbyor ba brtsams pa la nyes byas gcig go //
translated: This means that it is good, because the actual basis of a serious offense of the Sangha has not occurred.🔽Previously, there was one offense of wrong conduct for beginning the preparation.

original: bzhams te bsgo ba ma btang ba'i mthar nyes pa spom po gcig go //🔽gsol ba byas pa rdzogs pa'i mthar yang nyes pa sbom po gcig go //🔽las brjod pa dang po byas pa rdzogs pa'i mthar yang nyes pa sbom po gcig go //
analyzed: bzhams te bsgo ba ma btang ba'i mthar nyes pa spom po gcig go // gsol ba byas pa rdzogs pa'i mthar yang nyes pa sbom po gcig go // las brjod pa dang po byas pa rdzogs pa'i mthar yang nyes pa sbom po gcig go //
translated: At the end of the first announcement, there was one serious offense.🔽At the end of the second announcement, there was one serious offense.

original: las brjod pa gnyis pa byas pa rdzogs pa'i mthar yang nyes pa sbom po gcig go //
analyzed: las brjod pa gnyis pa byas pa rdzogs pa'i mthar yang nyes pa sbom po gcig go //
translated: At the end of the third announcement, there was one serious offense.🔽If he does not give up that basis, then there is a serious offense of the Sangha.

original: gal te mi gtong na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes bya ba ni brjod pa gsum pa dang / mjug sdud pa rdzogs pa'i mthar dge 'dun lhag ma'i dngos gzhi gcig 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: gal te mi gtong na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes bya ba ni brjod pa gsum pa dang / mjug sdud pa rdzogs pa'i mthar dge 'dun lhag ma'i dngos gzhi gcig 'byung ba'o //
translated: This means that at the end of the third announcement and the conclusion, there is one actual basis of a serious offense of the Sangha.

original: dge 'dun lhag ma zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin to //
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin to //
translated: The term “remainder” is as above.

original: des na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: des na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is called a “remainder in the order.”

original: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
translated: Here, the fundamental transgression is established as follows.

original: dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa de'i grogs nyid rjes su sgrub par byed pa mi gtong na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa de'i grogs nyid rjes su sgrub par byed pa mi gtong na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one does not give up the support of the schism in the order, then it is a remainder in the order.

original: de'i bye brag ni ston pa bzhugs pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de'i bye brag ni ston pa bzhugs pa'i tshe /
translated: The specific points are as follows.

original: gang zag gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i tshogs las dge slong bzhi yan chad logs shig tu bkar te /
analyzed: gang zag gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mthun pa'i tshogs las dge slong bzhi yan chad logs shig tu bkar te /
translated: When the Teacher is present, if a person separates a group of four or more fully ordained monks from the harmonious assembly of the Tathāgata’s śrāvaka order and

original: chos dang zang zing gis longs spyod tha dad par byed pa de'i rjes su phyogs shing grogs nyid du rjes su sgrub par byed pa la dge 'dun gyis bzhams te bsgo ba dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzlog pa na /
analyzed: chos dang zang zing gis longs spyod tha dad par byed pa de'i rjes su phyogs shing grogs nyid du rjes su sgrub par byed pa la dge 'dun gyis bzhams te bsgo ba dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzlog pa na /
translated: makes them enjoy Dharma and material things separately, then if the order admonishes him with a proposal and he does not stop, and if he is stopped by a proposal and a four-part formal procedure,

original: brjod pa gsum pa'i mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa'i mthar mi gtong na dge 'dun lhag ma'i dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brjod pa gsum pa'i mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa'i mthar mi gtong na dge 'dun lhag ma'i dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
translated: If one does not stop at the end of the third announcement, then it is the actual basis of a saṃgha schism.

original: 'di'i byed pa po ni ston pa bzhugs bzhin dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i byed pa po ni ston pa bzhugs bzhin dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'o //
translated: The perpetrator of this is one who sides with the schism of the saṃgha while the Teacher is still alive.

original: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
translated: Here, the actual basis of a downfall is five limbs:

original: ston pa bzhugs pa dang / @70a * //
analyzed: ston pa bzhugs pa dang / @70a * //
translated: the Teacher is still alive,

original: dge 'dun du langs pa dang / dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa'i rjes su phyogs pa dang / chos dang mthun pas bzlog pa dang / las brjod pa gsum pa'i mthar mi gtong ba'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun du langs pa dang / dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa'i rjes su phyogs pa dang / chos dang mthun pas bzlog pa dang / las brjod pa gsum pa'i mthar mi gtong ba'o //
translated: the saṃgha is united, one sides with the schism of the saṃgha, one is stopped by those who are in accord with the Dharma, and one does not stop at the end of the third announcement.

original: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na snad do //
analyzed: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na snad do //
translated: If any of these limbs is incomplete, then it is a partial defeat.

original: de'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma ste bcu gcig pa'o /
analyzed: de'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma ste bcu gcig pa'o /
translated: This is the eleventh partial defeat of siding with a schism of the saṃgha.

original: // / khyim sun 'byin pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i gleng gzhi ni /
analyzed: // / khyim sun 'byin pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i gleng gzhi ni /
translated: The introduction to the partial defeat of creating a disturbance in a household is this.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa'i tshe /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa'i tshe /
translated: When the Buddha, the Blessed One, was staying in Śrāvastī, in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍada’s park,

original: re lde ri la dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang / nab so gnyi dang / dge slong dmar ser can dag khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa dag 'khod de /
analyzed: re lde ri la dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang / nab so gnyi dang / dge slong dmar ser can dag khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa dag 'khod de /
translated: in Veṇu village, the monks Aśvaka and Kaṭamoraka, and the monks with reddish-brown hair, who were householders, were engaging in bad behavior, causing trouble for the householders.

original: de dag dge sbyong gi las ma yin pa dag byed cing /
analyzed: de dag dge sbyong gi las ma yin pa dag byed cing /
translated: They were doing things that were not the duties of ascetics,

original: byed du 'jug pa'i spyod tshul dang / spyod pa dang / log par sgrub pa des /
analyzed: byed du 'jug pa'i spyod tshul dang / spyod pa dang / log par sgrub pa des /
translated: and because of their behavior, their conduct, and their wrong practice,

original: re lde ri la dge slong ma 'ongs pa dag kyang mi 'ong la /
analyzed: re lde ri la dge slong ma 'ongs pa dag kyang mi 'ong la /
translated: the monks who had not yet come to Veṇu village did not come,

original: 'ongs pa dag kyang mngon par mi dga' zhing /
analyzed: 'ongs pa dag kyang mngon par mi dga' zhing /
translated: and those who had come did not enjoy it.

original: re lde ri'i gnas spong bar byed do //
analyzed: re lde ri'i gnas spong bar byed do //

original: de ltar bzhams te bsgo ba mi gtong na /

translated: He should be pressed to do so and instructed, means he should be pressed to do so with a legal procedure of announcement in the midst of the community, as was previously presented.

analyzed: gsol ba gcig byas pa'i 'og tu las brjod pa gsum bya ba'o //
translated: A second and a third time means that after one motion, the procedure is to be done three times.

original: yang dag par bsgo ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: yang dag par bsgo ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa ni snga ma bzhin no //

original: lam gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo /
analyzed: lam gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo /

original: yang dag par bstan pa na gzhi de gtong na de lta na legs zhes bya ba ni /🔽de ltar na bzang ba ste /

analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma'i dngos gzhi'i ltung ba ma byung ba'i phyir ro //

original: sngar ni sbyor ba brtsams pa la nyes byas gcig go //🔽bzhams te bsgo ba ma btang ba'i mthar nyes pa sbom po gcig go //

translated: Previously, when he began the preparatory act, he committed one minor offense.🔽When the procedure of asking for consent is performed but not relinquished, he commits one serious offense.

original: gsol ba byas pa rdzogs pa'i mthar yang nyes pa sbom po gcig go //🔽las brjod pa dang po byas pa rdzogs pa'i mthar yang nyes pa sbom po gcig go //

original: las brjod pa gnyis pa rdzogs par byas pa'i mthar yang nyes pa sbom po gcig go //
analyzed: las brjod pa gnyis pa rdzogs par byas pa'i mthar yang nyes pa sbom po gcig go //
translated: When the second announcement is completed, he commits one serious offense.

original: gal te mi gtong na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gal te mi gtong na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If he does not give up that basis, he commits an offense entailing suspension.”

analyzed: las brjod pa gsum pa dang / mjug sdud pa rdzogs pa'i mthar dge 'dun lhag ma'i dngos gzhi gcig 'byung ba'o //
translated: The third announcement of the action and the conclusion of the rite are the same as before.

original: dge 'dun lhag ma zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te /
translated: The basic transgression of a partial defeat is called “partial defeat” for the same reason as before.

original: des na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: des na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is called “a partial defeat.”

original: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
translated: Here, the basic transgression is defined as follows:

translated: When a monk is accused of a partial defeat,

original: bdag nyid kyis de la dge slong dag gis brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid du byed pa mi gtong na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis de la dge slong dag gis brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid du byed pa mi gtong na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro //
translated: if he does not give up his position that the other monks should not speak to him, then he commits a partial defeat.🔽The distinctions within this are as follows:

original: de'i bye brag ni bka' blo mi bde ba'i dge slong la dge slong rnams kyis gleng ba dang / dran par byas pa na bdag nyid la phyogs bcu na gnas pa /
analyzed: de'i bye brag ni bka' blo mi bde ba'i dge slong la dge slong rnams kyis gleng ba dang / dran par byas pa na bdag nyid la phyogs bcu na gnas pa /
translated: When a monk who is difficult to talk to is accused by the other monks and reminded of his faults, if he does not give up his position that the other monks should not speak to him, then he commits a partial defeat.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge slong gu dge 'dun thams cad kyis lhag pa'i tshul khrims su gtogs pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad kyis gleng bar mi bya'o zhes zer ba la /🔽dge 'dun gyis bzhams te bsgo ba dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzlog pa na /🔽las brjod pa gsum pa mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa'i mthar mi gtong na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge slong gu dge 'dun thams cad kyis lhag pa'i tshul khrims su gtogs pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad kyis gleng bar mi bya'o zhes zer ba la / dge 'dun gyis bzhams te bsgo ba dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzlog pa na / las brjod pa gsum pa mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa'i mthar mi gtong na /
translated: The Saṅgha should not accuse the monk Guṇamati of any of the bases of training included in the ethical conduct of a monk.🔽If the Saṅgha admonishes him in a friendly way and he does not stop,🔽and if the Saṅgha does a procedure of admonishing him, and he still does not stop,🔽and if the Saṅgha does a procedure of banishing him, and he still does not stop,

original: dge 'dun lhag ma'i dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma'i dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
translated: then he commits an offense entailing suspension.

original: 'di'i byed pa po ni /
analyzed: 'di'i byed pa po ni /
translated: The perpetrator:

original: bka' blo mi bde ba dang / gleng ba la sogs pa'i las byas pa'o //
analyzed: bka' blo mi bde ba dang / gleng ba la sogs pa'i las byas pa'o //
translated: the one who does the procedure of banishing him.🔽The basis:🔽the monk Guṇamati.

original: 'di la yan lag drug gis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di la yan lag drug gis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
translated: The six factors:

original: bka' blo mi bde ba dang / gleng ba dang / dran par byas pa dang / bdag nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid du byed pa dang / chos dang mthun pas bzlog pa dang / las brjod pa gsum pa'i mthar mi gtong ba'o //
analyzed: bka' blo mi bde ba dang / gleng ba dang / dran par byas pa dang / bdag nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid du byed pa dang / chos dang mthun pas bzlog pa dang / las brjod pa gsum pa'i mthar mi gtong ba'o //
translated: Displeasing the Saṅgha, speaking, reminding, making oneself not to be spoken to, opposing in a way that accords with the Dharma, and not releasing at the end of the third announcement of the action.

original: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
analyzed: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
translated: If any of these are incomplete, one is criticized as appropriate.

original: bka' blo mi bde ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma ste bcu gsum pa'o /
analyzed: bka' blo mi bde ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma ste bcu gsum pa'o /
translated: This is the thirteenth downfall, a partially concordant offense for a fully ordained monk.

original: // / da 'di chad ni dge 'dun lhag ma gdon pa'i mjug bsdu ba dang / de dag gi rnam par gzhag pa dang / phyir bcos pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa bsgrag par bya ba rnams ston to //
analyzed: // / da 'di chad ni dge 'dun lhag ma gdon pa'i mjug bsdu ba dang / de dag gi rnam par gzhag pa dang / phyir bcos pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa bsgrag par bya ba rnams ston to //
translated: Now, from here on, it teaches the summary at the end of the confession of the partial defeats, their presentation, their amendment, and the proclamation of the presentation.

original: de la dge 'dun lhag ma gdon pa'i mjug bsdu ba ni /
analyzed: de la dge 'dun lhag ma gdon pa'i mjug bsdu ba ni /
translated: Regarding that, the summary at the end of the confession of the partial defeats is taught by:

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum po dag bton zin to zhes bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum po dag bton zin to zhes bya bas bstan te /
translated: Venerable Ones, I have recited the thirteen partial defeats.

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag ces bya ba ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag ces bya ba ni bod pa'o //
translated: Venerable Ones is an address.

original: bdag gis zhes bya ba ni 'don pas so //
analyzed: bdag gis zhes bya ba ni 'don pas so //
translated: “By me” is stated by the reciter.

original: dge 'dun lhag ma zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: “Remainder of the Saṅgha” is as before.

original: chos zhes bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos zhes bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “Dharma” means that which holds its own characteristics.

original: bcu gsum po dag ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: bcu gsum po dag ces bya ba ni /
translated: “The thirteen” means

original: grangs sngar smos pa rnams kyi byungs gdab pa'o //
analyzed: grangs sngar smos pa rnams kyi byungs gdab pa'o //
translated: the enumeration of those previously mentioned.

original: bton zin to zhes bya ba ni dam bcas pa'i don gyi mjug bsdu ba'i phyir dang / nyan pa po rnams por bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bton zin to zhes bya ba ni dam bcas pa'i don gyi mjug bsdu ba'i phyir dang / nyan pa po rnams por bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “Already recited” means that the meaning of the promise is concluded and in order to encourage the listeners.

original: de dag gi rnams par gzhag pa ni /
analyzed: de dag gi rnams par gzhag pa ni /
translated: Their presentation is🔽taught as follows:

original: de dag las dgu ni ltung ba dang @77a * //🔽po nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de dag las dgu ni ltung ba dang @77a * // po nyid kyis so //
translated: Nine of them are offenses from the very first,

original: bzhi ni lan gsum gyis so zhes bya ba bstan te /
analyzed: bzhi ni lan gsum gyis so zhes bya ba bstan te /
translated: and four are after the third announcement.

original: de dag las zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum po bton pa de dag las so //
analyzed: de dag las zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum po bton pa de dag las so //
translated: “Of them” means of those thirteen Dharmas of the Remainder of the Saṅgha that have been recited.

original: dgu ni zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dgu ni zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Nine” means

original: khu ba 'byin pa dang / lus kyis reg pa dang / 'khrig pa dang ldan pa smra ba dang / bsnyen bkur bsngags pa dang / smyan byed pa dang / khang pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang / gzhi med par skur pa 'debs pa dang /
analyzed: khu ba 'byin pa dang / lus kyis reg pa dang / 'khrig pa dang ldan pa smra ba dang / bsnyen bkur bsngags pa dang / smyan byed pa dang / khang pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang / gzhi med par skur pa 'debs pa dang /
translated: Ejaculation, physical contact, speaking of sexual union, praising service, acting as a matchmaker, houses, temples, and groundless slander.

original: gzhan gyi cha ma yin pa dang mthun pa rnams so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi cha ma yin pa dang mthun pa rnams so //
translated: These are the ten actions with counteragents.

original: ltung ba dang po dag nyid kyis so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ltung ba dang po dag nyid kyis so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: By the first downfall itself.

original: dang po sbyor ba rtsom pa dang / nyes pa sbom po dang / dngos gzhi'i rim gyis dang pos ltung bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: dang po sbyor ba rtsom pa dang / nyes pa sbom po dang / dngos gzhi'i rim gyis dang pos ltung bar 'gyur la /
translated: By the first, one falls by the process of preparation, grave fault, and basis.

original: 'byung ba dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: 'byung ba dang bcas pa ste /
translated: It is accompanied by emergence.

original: 'di dag la dge 'dun gyis dang por bzhams te bsgo ba dang gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzlog pa'i tshul gyis mi gtong bar rjes su sgrub pa las dngos gzhir gzhag pa yid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di dag la dge 'dun gyis dang por bzhams te bsgo ba dang gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzlog pa'i tshul gyis mi gtong bar rjes su sgrub pa las dngos gzhir gzhag pa yid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the saṅgha does not relinquish the first downfall by the method of reversal through the four acts of announcement and request, but by subsequent practice.

original: bzhi ni zhes bya ba dge 'dun 'byed pa dang / de'i rjes su phyogs pa dang / khyim sun 'byin pa dang / bka' blo mi bde ba rnams so //
analyzed: bzhi ni zhes bya ba dge 'dun 'byed pa dang / de'i rjes su phyogs pa dang / khyim sun 'byin pa dang / bka' blo mi bde ba rnams so //
translated: The four are the schism in the Saṅgha, siding with a schismatic, corrupting a patron’s family, and being disobedient.

original: lan gsum gyi bar gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lan gsum gyi bar gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Up to three times is the limit.

original: las brjod pa lan gsum gyi bar gyis dngos gzhir 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: las brjod pa lan gsum gyi bar gyis dngos gzhir 'gyur ba ste /
translated: The actual basis is up to three announcements of the formal procedure.

original: dang po sbyor ba rtsom pa dang / dge 'dun gyis bzhams te bsgo ba dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzlog pa'i tshul gyis mi gtong bar rjes su sgrub pa na /
analyzed: dang po sbyor ba rtsom pa dang / dge 'dun gyis bzhams te bsgo ba dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bzlog pa'i tshul gyis mi gtong bar rjes su sgrub pa na /
translated: If one does not stop after the initial preparation, after the Saṅgha has given a warning, and after the announcement of a formal procedure of the community, and if one does not stop after the announcement of the formal procedure of the community,

original: gsol ba byas pa'i 'og tu las brjod pa lan gsum gyi bar gyis mi gtong na /
analyzed: gsol ba byas pa'i 'og tu las brjod pa lan gsum gyi bar gyis mi gtong na /
translated: then after the announcement, up to three times the announcement of the formal procedure, if one does not stop,

original: las brjod pa gsum pa rdzogs pa'i mthar dngos gzhir 'gyur la 'byung ba dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: las brjod pa gsum pa rdzogs pa'i mthar dngos gzhir 'gyur la 'byung ba dang bcas pa ste /
translated: then at the end of the completion of the third announcement of the formal procedure, it becomes the actual basis, and it is accompanied by an offense.

original: 'di dag ni bsgo ba las gyur pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni bsgo ba las gyur pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma zhes bya'o //
translated: These are called “the remaining offenses entailing suspension that are related to the Saṅgha.”

original: 'di la 'dir dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dang / de'i rjes su phyogs pa dang / khyim sun 'byin pa dang / bka' blo mi bde ba zhes bya ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma tha ma bzhi po rnams kyi spyi'i thun mong gi mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di la 'dir dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dang / de'i rjes su phyogs pa dang / khyim sun 'byin pa dang / bka' blo mi bde ba zhes bya ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma tha ma bzhi po rnams kyi spyi'i thun mong gi mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
translated: Here, the four remaining residual offenses of the Saṅgha are explained in general: causing a schism in the Saṅgha, siding with that, causing householders to lose faith, and disobeying the Saṅgha.

original: de'i phyir bzlog pa'i tshul gyis mi gtong bar rjes su sgrub pa'i rang bzhin ni rjes su mthun no zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bzlog pa'i tshul gyis mi gtong bar rjes su sgrub pa'i rang bzhin ni rjes su mthun no zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore, the nature of not relinquishing through the method of reversal is called concordant.

original: dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dang / de'i rjes su phyogs pa dang / khyim sun 'byin pa dang / bka' blo mi bde ba zhes bya ba dge 'dun lhag ma bhi po 'di dag la /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dang / de'i rjes su phyogs pa dang / khyim sun 'byin pa dang / bka' blo mi bde ba zhes bya ba dge 'dun lhag ma bhi po 'di dag la /
translated: In these four residual offenses of the Saṅgha, causing a schism in the Saṅgha, siding with that, causing householders to lose faith, and disobeying the Saṅgha,

original: dang po rtsom pa sbyor ba na sbyor ba @77b zhes bya ba'i nyes byas gcig 'byung ngo //
analyzed: dang po rtsom pa sbyor ba na sbyor ba @77b zhes bya ba'i nyes byas gcig 'byung ngo //
translated: when one first begins to prepare, one commits a single fault called preparation.

original: de'i 'og tu dag la dge 'dun gyis bzhams te bsgo bas bzlog pa'i cho ga bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu dag la dge 'dun gyis bzhams te bsgo bas bzlog pa'i cho ga bya'o //
translated: After that, the Saṅgha should admonish them with reconciliation and perform the ceremony of reversal.

original: de'i 'og tu gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bas bzlog pa'i cho ga dang las bya ste /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bas bzlog pa'i cho ga dang las bya ste /
translated: Then, the rite of reversal and the act of reversal are performed by the act of enjoinment through the four-part formal procedure of proposal and the monk is reversed.

original: de la rim pa ni /
analyzed: de la rim pa ni /
translated: The stages of this are as follows:

original: dge 'dun lhag ma bzhi po 'di dag la dang po rtsom pa sbyor ba na /
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma bzhi po 'di dag la dang po rtsom pa sbyor ba na /
translated: When the first of these four partial defeats is initiated,

original: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i nyes byas gcig byung ba de la /🔽dge 'dun gyis dang por bzhams te bsgo bar bya ba dang / de'i 'og tu gsol ba bya ba dang / de'i 'og tu las brjod pa dang por bya ba dang / de'i 'og tu las brjod pa gnyis pa bya ba dang / de'i 'og tu las brjod pa gsum pa dag gis bzlog pa'i tshul gyis bzlog pa'i cho ga dang /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i nyes byas gcig byung ba de la / dge 'dun gyis dang por bzhams te bsgo bar bya ba dang / de'i 'og tu gsol ba bya ba dang / de'i 'og tu las brjod pa dang por bya ba dang / de'i 'og tu las brjod pa gnyis pa bya ba dang / de'i 'og tu las brjod pa gsum pa dag gis bzlog pa'i tshul gyis bzlog pa'i cho ga dang /
translated: a single fault called the preparation of preparation occurs.🔽Then, the rite of reversal is performed by the method of reversal through the first enjoinment of reconciliation by the Saṅgha, then the proposal, then the first announcement of the act, then the second announcement of the act, and then the third announcement of the act.

original: las byed pa na bzhams te bsgo ba dang / gsol ba dang / las brjod pa dang po dang / las brjod pa gnyis po dag la mi gtong bar rjes su sgrub pa'i rang bzhin ni /
analyzed: las byed pa na bzhams te bsgo ba dang / gsol ba dang / las brjod pa dang po dang / las brjod pa gnyis po dag la mi gtong bar rjes su sgrub pa'i rang bzhin ni /
translated: When the act is performed, the act of reversal is performed by the nature of not relinquishing the first enjoinment of reconciliation, the proposal, the first announcement of the act, and the second announcement of the act.

original: nyes pa sbom po re rer 'gyur bar rjes su mthun te 'dra'o //
analyzed: nyes pa sbom po re rer 'gyur bar rjes su mthun te 'dra'o //
translated: For each grave offense, it is similar in that it is consistent.

original: las brjod pa gsum pa mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa rdzogs na ni dge 'dun lhag ma'i dngos gzhur 'gyur /
analyzed: las brjod pa gsum pa mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa rdzogs na ni dge 'dun lhag ma'i dngos gzhur 'gyur /
translated: If the third announcement of the formal procedure of the saṅgha is completed with the conclusion, then it is the actual basis of a serious offense of the saṅgha.

original: de ltar na dang por sbyor ba na nyes byas so //
analyzed: de ltar na dang por sbyor ba na nyes byas so //
translated: Thus, at first, when one is preparing, it is a minor offense.

original: de'i 'og tu bzhams te bsgo ba mi gtong na de'i mthar nyes pa sbom po gcig go //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu bzhams te bsgo ba mi gtong na de'i mthar nyes pa sbom po gcig go //
translated: After that, if one does not stop when one is being admonished, then at the end of that, it is one grave offense.

original: de'i 'og tu gsol ba dang bzhi'i las byed pa na /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu gsol ba dang bzhi'i las byed pa na /
translated: After that, when one is performing the formal procedure of proposal and the four parts,

original: gsol ba byas pa mi gtong na /
analyzed: gsol ba byas pa mi gtong na /
translated: if one does not stop when the proposal is made,

original: gsol ba rdzogs pa'i mthar yang nyes pa sbom po gcig go //
analyzed: gsol ba rdzogs pa'i mthar yang nyes pa sbom po gcig go //
translated: then at the end of completing the proposal, it is one grave offense.

original: de'i 'og tu las brjod pa dang por byas pa na mi gtong na /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu las brjod pa dang por byas pa na mi gtong na /
translated: After that, if one does not stop when the first announcement of the formal procedure is performed,

original: las brjod pa dang po rdzogs pa'i mthar yang nyes pa sbom po gcig go //
analyzed: las brjod pa dang po rdzogs pa'i mthar yang nyes pa sbom po gcig go //
translated: then at the end of completing the first announcement of the formal procedure, it is one grave offense.

original: de'i 'og tu las brjod pa gnyis pa byas pa na mi gtong na /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu las brjod pa gnyis pa byas pa na mi gtong na /
translated: After that, if one does not stop when the second announcement of the formal procedure is performed,

original: las brjod pa gnyis pa rdzogs pa'i mthar yang nyes pa sbom po gcig go //
analyzed: las brjod pa gnyis pa rdzogs pa'i mthar yang nyes pa sbom po gcig go //
translated: then at the end of completing the second announcement of the formal procedure, it is one grave offense.

original: de'i 'og tu las brjod pa mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa rdzogs pa'i mthar dge 'dun lhag ma'i dngos gzhi gcig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu las brjod pa mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa rdzogs pa'i mthar dge 'dun lhag ma'i dngos gzhi gcig tu 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, after that, the recitation of the act together with the conclusion is completed, and at the end, it becomes the actual basis of a partial defeat of the Saṅgha.

original: de ltar na dge 'dun lhag ma 'di bzhi la dang po rtsom par sbyor ba na nyes byas byed pa yin /
analyzed: de ltar na dge 'dun lhag ma 'di bzhi la dang po rtsom par sbyor ba na nyes byas byed pa yin /
translated: Thus, when one begins the first of these four partial defeats of the Saṅgha, one commits a minor offense.

original: bzhams te bsgo ba dang / gsol ba dang / las brjod pa dang po dang gnyis pa ni nyes pa sbom po re rer byed pa yin /
analyzed: bzhams te bsgo ba dang / gsol ba dang / las brjod pa dang po dang gnyis pa ni nyes pa sbom po re rer byed pa yin /
translated: When one is admonished, and when the announcement and the first and second recitations of the act are completed, one commits a serious offense.

original: las brjod pa gsum pa mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa rdzogs pa ni /
analyzed: las brjod pa gsum pa mjug sdud pa dang bcas pa rdzogs pa ni /
translated: When the third recitation of the act together with the conclusion is completed,

original: dge 'dun lhag ma'i dngos gzhi byed pa yin no //
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma'i dngos gzhi byed pa yin no //
translated: one commits the actual basis of a partial defeat of the Saṅgha.

original: de dag gi tshig skad cig pa rnams ni gcig nyid de /🔽tshig gang la skad cig ma gcig la ltung ba 'byung bar @78a * //
analyzed: de dag gi tshig skad cig pa rnams ni gcig nyid de / tshig gang la skad cig ma gcig la ltung ba 'byung bar @78a * //
translated: The words of these are just one moment.🔽The moment in which a downfall occurs

original: 'gyur ba'i skad cig ma de'i khongs su tshig mtha' dag 'dus so //
analyzed: 'gyur ba'i skad cig ma de'i khongs su tshig mtha' dag 'dus so //
translated: is included in the words.

original: des na de dag gi tshig shin tu rgyun ring du zin na yang tshig gcig tu zad de /
analyzed: des na de dag gi tshig shin tu rgyun ring du zin na yang tshig gcig tu zad de /
translated: Therefore, even if the words of these are very long, they are just one word.

original: ltung ba yang gcig kho na 'byung ba yin gyi /
analyzed: ltung ba yang gcig kho na 'byung ba yin gyi /
translated: And it is only one downfall that occurs,

original: cha shas re re la yang ma yin no //
analyzed: cha shas re re la yang ma yin no //
translated: not a part for each portion.

original: mjug sdud pa ni tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mjug sdud pa ni tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: The summary is not separate,

original: las brjod pa tha ma'i nang du 'dus so //
analyzed: las brjod pa tha ma'i nang du 'dus so //
translated: but is included in the last recitation of the action.

original: phyir bcos pa ni /
analyzed: phyir bcos pa ni /
translated: The amendment:

original: dge slong gis de dag la ltung ba gang yang rung ba zhig byas la /
analyzed: dge slong gis de dag la ltung ba gang yang rung ba zhig byas la /
translated: If a monk has committed any of these downfalls,

original: ji srid du shes bzhin du 'chab par byed pa de srid du /
analyzed: ji srid du shes bzhin du 'chab par byed pa de srid du /
translated: for as long as he conceals them knowingly,

original: des mi 'dod bzhin du spo ba bya'o //
analyzed: des mi 'dod bzhin du spo ba bya'o //
translated: for that long he must undergo probation unwillingly.

original: dge slong gis mi 'dod bzhin du spo ba byas nas /
analyzed: dge slong gis mi 'dod bzhin du spo ba byas nas /
translated: If a monk has undergone probation unwillingly,

original: de'i 'og tu zhag drug gi bar du dge 'dun mgu bar bya ba spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu zhag drug gi bar du dge 'dun mgu bar bya ba spyad par bya'o //
translated: after that he must practice for six days to please the saṅgha.

original: dge slong gis mgu bar bya ba spyad bas dbyung bar bya ba la thogs te /
analyzed: dge slong gis mgu bar bya ba spyad bas dbyung bar bya ba la thogs te /
translated: If a monk who has practiced to please the saṅgha is obstructed from being released,

original: chos dang mthun par byas la dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi sems mgu bar byas na /
analyzed: chos dang mthun par byas la dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi sems mgu bar byas na /
translated: he should act in accordance with the Dharma and please the minds of the saṅgha of monks.

original: gang dge slong nyi shu'i tshogs kyi dge 'dun yod pa der dge slong de dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang dge slong nyi shu'i tshogs kyi dge 'dun yod pa der dge slong de dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: He should be released in a saṅgha of monks that has a group of twenty monks.

original: gal te dge slong nyi shur gcig gis ma tshang ba'i tshogs kyi dge 'dun gyis dge slong de 'byin par byed na /
analyzed: gal te dge slong nyi shur gcig gis ma tshang ba'i tshogs kyi dge 'dun gyis dge slong de 'byin par byed na /
translated: If a community of monks, short by one of a quorum of twenty, expels that monk,

original: dge slong de yang ma phyin la dag slong de dag kyang smad par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: dge slong de yang ma phyin la dag slong de dag kyang smad par bya ba yin te /
translated: that monk is not expelled, and those monks are to be censured.

original: de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bya bas bstan te /
translated: This is the rite for that.

original: 'dis ni dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba phyir bcos pa'i cho ga dang las spyir bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba phyir bcos pa'i cho ga dang las spyir bstan to //
translated: This teaches the general rite and procedure for the amendment of a partial defeat.

original: de la dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni ltung ba 'byin par byed pas so //
analyzed: de la dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni ltung ba 'byin par byed pas so //
translated: “A monk” means one who commits the downfall.

original: de dag las ltung ba gang yang rung ba zhig byas la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de dag las ltung ba gang yang rung ba zhig byas la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Having committed any of those downfalls” means

original: dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum po de dag las dngos gzhi'i ltung ba gang yang rung bzhi byas pa'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum po de dag las dngos gzhi'i ltung ba gang yang rung bzhi byas pa'o //
translated: having committed any of the thirteen partial defeats.

original: ji srid du shes bzhin du 'chab par byed pa zhes bya ba ni ;
analyzed: ji srid du shes bzhin du 'chab par byed pa zhes bya ba ni ;
translated: “As long as he conceals it knowingly” means

original: bdag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i dngos gzhi'i ltung ba byung bar shes bzhin du bcab pa'i sems kyis 'chab cing /
analyzed: bdag la dge 'dun lhag ma'i dngos gzhi'i ltung ba byung bar shes bzhin du bcab pa'i sems kyis 'chab cing /
translated: Knowing that one has committed a root downfall of a monk, one conceals it with the intention to hide it.

original: gzhan la mthol bar mi byed pa'o //🔽de srid du des mi 'dod bzhin du spo bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni ji srid du shes bzhin du 'chab par byed pa'i dus de srid du /
analyzed: gzhan la mthol bar mi byed pa'o // de srid du des mi 'dod bzhin du spo bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni ji srid du shes bzhin du 'chab par byed pa'i dus de srid du /
translated: One does not confess it to another.🔽For as long as one conceals it knowingly, for that long one must be sent away unwillingly.

original: dge slong des bdag nyid mi 'dod cing ma dad bzhin du yang spo ba'i las bya dgos pa sta /
analyzed: dge slong des bdag nyid mi 'dod cing ma dad bzhin du yang spo ba'i las bya dgos pa sta /
translated: For as long as one conceals it knowingly, for that long the monk must be sent away unwillingly, even though he does not want to.

original: spo ba zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba bcab pa sbyang ba'i chad pa'i las kyi ming ste /
analyzed: spo ba zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba bcab pa sbyang ba'i chad pa'i las kyi ming ste /
translated: Sending away is the name of the punishment for purifying the concealment of a root downfall of a monk.

original: dge slong rang bzhin du gnas pa yongs su dag pa'i sa nas /
analyzed: dge slong rang bzhin du gnas pa yongs su dag pa'i sa nas /
translated: A monk who is naturally abiding in the pure stage

original: yongs su ma dag pa'i sa gzhan du spo ba'o //
analyzed: yongs su ma dag pa'i sa gzhan du spo ba'o //
translated: is sent to another impure stage.

original: dge slong gis mi 'dod @78b bzhin du spo ba byas pas 'og tu zhag drug gi bar du dge 'dun mgu bar bya ba spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni de ltar ji srid du /
analyzed: dge slong gis mi 'dod @78b bzhin du spo ba byas pas 'og tu zhag drug gi bar du dge 'dun mgu bar bya ba spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni de ltar ji srid du /
translated: A monk who is transferred against his will should practice pleasing the saṅgha for six nights.🔽As long as he conceals the offense knowingly, he is transferred against his will.

original: shes bzhin du 'chab par byed pa de srid du des mi 'dod bzhin du spo ba byas nas de'i 'og tu des bdag nyid dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba las dbyung ba'i ched du mtshams gcig gi dge 'dun la mgu bar bya ba spyad par bya ste /
analyzed: shes bzhin du 'chab par byed pa de srid du des mi 'dod bzhin du spo ba byas nas de'i 'og tu des bdag nyid dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba las dbyung ba'i ched du mtshams gcig gi dge 'dun la mgu bar bya ba spyad par bya ste /
translated: After that, he should practice pleasing the saṅgha in order to be released from the offense entailing suspension.

original: mgu bar spyad pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mgu bar spyad pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The term “pleasing”🔽means to please the whole saṅgha

original: bsnyen bkur dang chos dang zang zing gi longs spyod kyis /🔽dge 'dun thams cad thugs mnyes par bya ba'i bsnyen bkur gyi las kyi ming ngo //
analyzed: bsnyen bkur dang chos dang zang zing gi longs spyod kyis / dge 'dun thams cad thugs mnyes par bya ba'i bsnyen bkur gyi las kyi ming ngo //
translated: by means of service, the Dharma, and material things.

original: dge slong gis mgu bar bya ba spyad nas dbyung ba la thogs te zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dge slong gis mgu bar bya ba spyad nas dbyung ba la thogs te zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “The monk who has practiced pleasing but is still not released” means

original: de ltar dge slong gis zhag drug gi bar du dge 'dun mgu bar bya ba spyad nas de'i 'og tu dge 'dun gyis de dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba las bya ba 'ba' zhig la thogs shing rag las pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar dge slong gis zhag drug gi bar du dge 'dun mgu bar bya ba spyad nas de'i 'og tu dge 'dun gyis de dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba las bya ba 'ba' zhig la thogs shing rag las pa ste /
translated: Thus, after a monk has practiced for six days to please the Saṅgha, then after that the Saṅgha is obstructed and dependent on only the procedure for that monk to rise up from the offense of a partially concordant downfall.

original: dbyung ba zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba las bslang ba'i las kyi ming ngo //🔽chos dang mthun par byas la zhes bya ba ni des bdag nyid dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba las bslab pa'i las kyi ming ngo //
analyzed: dbyung ba zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba las bslang ba'i las kyi ming ngo // chos dang mthun par byas la zhes bya ba ni des bdag nyid dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba las bslab pa'i las kyi ming ngo //
translated: “To rise up” is the name of the procedure for rising up from the offense of a partially concordant downfall.🔽“In accordance with the Dharma” means that he himself has done the procedure for rising up from the offense of a partially concordant downfall.

original: chos dang mthun par byas la zhes bya ba ni des bdag nyid dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba las dbyung ba'i don du /
analyzed: chos dang mthun par byas la zhes bya ba ni des bdag nyid dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba las dbyung ba'i don du /
translated: “In accordance with the Dharma” means that he himself has done the procedure for rising up from the offense of a partially concordant downfall.

original: gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gand'i brdungs te /
analyzed: gnas mal bsham pa byas nas gand'i brdungs te /
translated: Having prepared the seats, he should ring the gong

original: dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas /
analyzed: dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas /
translated: and announce to the monks with the words of the announcement.

original: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par bya ba la sogs pa chos dang mthun pa'i las byas pa'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par bya ba la sogs pa chos dang mthun pa'i las byas pa'o //
translated: The Sangha is in agreement about the action that is in accord with the Dharma, such as sitting together.

original: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis sems mgu bar byas na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis sems mgu bar byas na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “The Sangha of monks is satisfied” means

original: des dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la /
analyzed: des dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa la /
translated: that the Sangha is in agreement about sitting together.

original: mchil lham gnyis phud de /
analyzed: mchil lham gnyis phud de /
translated: He should take off his two sandals🔽and put his upper robe over one shoulder.

original: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas rgan pa'i mtha' logs su phyag 'tshal nas /
analyzed: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas rgan pa'i mtha' logs su phyag 'tshal nas /
translated: He should then bow down at the feet of the most senior monk,

original: tsog pur 'dug nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
analyzed: tsog pur 'dug nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
translated: sit in the kneeling position with his palms placed together,

original: bdag nyid dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba las dbyung ba'i cho ga gsol ba'i sngags lan gsum brjod pas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi sems mgu bar byas na'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba las dbyung ba'i cho ga gsol ba'i sngags lan gsum brjod pas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi sems mgu bar byas na'o //
translated: and say three times, “I ask the Sangha for the ceremony for rehabilitation from the offense of a partially concordant defeat.”🔽“He should be rehabilitated in a Sangha that has a group of twenty monks,

original: gang na dge slong nyi shu'i tshogs kyi dge 'dun yod pa der dge slong de dbyung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gang na dge slong nyi shu'i tshogs kyi dge 'dun yod pa der dge slong de dbyung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: in a place where there are twenty monks.”

original: dge 'dun gyis mtshams gang na dge slong nyi shu yan chad kyi tshogs kyi dge 'dun yod pa der dge slong de dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba las dbyung ba'i @79a * //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis mtshams gang na dge slong nyi shu yan chad kyi tshogs kyi dge 'dun yod pa der dge slong de dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba las dbyung ba'i @79a * //
translated: The Sangha of monks in a given region who number twenty or more may lift a monk’s suspension for a partial defeat.🔽

original: cho ga dang las bya'o //
analyzed: cho ga dang las bya'o //
translated: The Saṅgha should perform the rite and legal procedure to rehabilitate that monk in a boundary where there is a Saṅgha of at least twenty monks.

original: dbyung ba zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyis dge slong dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba las dbyung ba'i cho ga dang las kyi ming ngo //
analyzed: dbyung ba zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyis dge slong dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba las dbyung ba'i cho ga dang las kyi ming ngo //
translated: “Rehabilitation” is the name of the rite and legal procedure by which the Saṅgha rehabilitates a monk who has committed a serious offense.

original: gal te dge slong nyi shur gcig gis ma tshang ba'i tshogs kyi dge 'dun gyis dge slong de 'byin par byed na /
analyzed: gal te dge slong nyi shur gcig gis ma tshang ba'i tshogs kyi dge 'dun gyis dge slong de 'byin par byed na /
translated: If a Saṅgha of fewer than twenty monks rehabilitates that monk,

original: dge slong de yang ma phyin la dge slong de dag kyang smad par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: dge slong de yang ma phyin la dge slong de dag kyang smad par bya ba yin te /
translated: that monk is not rehabilitated, and those monks are to be censured.🔽“This is the rite” means that if the rite is not performed, the legal procedure is not broken.

original: de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bya ba ni cho ga las 'das na las mi 'chag so zhes bya ba ni gzhung bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bya ba ni cho ga las 'das na las mi 'chag so zhes bya ba ni gzhung bstan pa yin te /
translated: This is the teaching of the text.

original: 'dir dge 'dun lhag ma las dbyung ba'i cho ga ni /
analyzed: 'dir dge 'dun lhag ma las dbyung ba'i cho ga ni /
translated: Here is the rite for rehabilitating a monk from a serious offense.

original: bcabs na spo ba byed du gzhug pa dang / zhag drug mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dang / dge 'dun la dbyung bar bya ba gsol ba dang / dge slong nyi shu man chad kyi tshogs kyis chos bzhin du bya ba'o //
analyzed: bcabs na spo ba byed du gzhug pa dang / zhag drug mgu bar bya ba spyad pa dang / dge 'dun la dbyung bar bya ba gsol ba dang / dge slong nyi shu man chad kyi tshogs kyis chos bzhin du bya ba'o //
translated: If he conceals it, he is to be made to move to another place.🔽If he does not conceal it, he is to be made to please the community for six days.🔽If he does not please the community, he is to request the community to lift the penalty.

original: las ni dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mi g-yo ba gzhag par mi 'os bas de dbyung ba'i las bya ba'o //
analyzed: las ni dge 'dun gyis gsol ba dang bzhi'i las mi g-yo ba gzhag par mi 'os bas de dbyung ba'i las bya ba'o //
translated: If the community is less than twenty monks, the penalty cannot be lifted.

original: de dag ni re zhig dge 'dun la phyir bcos pa phyogs tsam bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni re zhig dge 'dun la phyir bcos pa phyogs tsam bstan pa yin no //
translated: These are the partial teachings on the restoration of the vows in the community.

original: rnam par gzhag pa bsgrag par bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa bsgrag par bya ba ni /
translated: The announcement of the decision

original: de la bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag la /
analyzed: de la bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag la /
translated: In this regard, I ask the venerable ones:

original: ci 'di la khyed yongs su dgag ma zhes dri'o //
analyzed: ci 'di la khyed yongs su dgag ma zhes dri'o //
translated: “Is this acceptable to you?”

original: ci 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes lan gnyis lam gsum du dri'o //
analyzed: ci 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes lan gnyis lam gsum du dri'o //
translated: I ask this a second and a third time.🔽If the venerable ones are pure in this matter, they should remain silent.

original: 'di la tshe dang ldan pa dag yongs su dag na 'di ltar cang mi smra bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: 'di la tshe dang ldan pa dag yongs su dag na 'di ltar cang mi smra bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes bya bas bstan te /
translated: I will regard your silence as assent.

original: de la zhes bya bas ni dge 'dun lhag ma bton pa de la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya bas ni dge 'dun lhag ma bton pa de la'o //
translated: In that refers to the above-mentioned partial defeat of the Saṅgha.

original: ci zhes bya ba ni yongs su dri ba'o //
analyzed: ci zhes bya ba ni yongs su dri ba'o //
translated: What is the inquiry.

original: 'di la zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong la'o //
analyzed: 'di la zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong la'o //
translated: Here is in regard to the purification.

original: khyed ces bya pa ni khyed cag go //
analyzed: khyed ces bya pa ni khyed cag go //
translated: You is in regard to you all.

original: yongs su dag gam zhes bya ba ni ltung ba ma byung ngam zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yongs su dag gam zhes bya ba ni ltung ba ma byung ngam zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Are you pure? is in regard to whether there has been any downfall.

original: shes zhes bya ba ni dri ba spyi la snyegs so //
analyzed: shes zhes bya ba ni dri ba spyi la snyegs so //
translated: Know is in regard to the general inquiry.

original: dri'o zhes bya ba ni dri ba dang po'o //
analyzed: dri'o zhes bya ba ni dri ba dang po'o //
translated: Ask is in regard to the first inquiry.

original: lan gnyis lam gsum du dri'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lan gnyis lam gsum du dri'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Ask twice and three times is in regard to the second and third inquiries.

original: lan gsum kho na dri bar bya dgos pas /
analyzed: lan gsum kho na dri bar bya dgos pas /
translated: Since it is necessary to ask only three times,

original: lan gnyis lam gsum du zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: lan gnyis lam gsum du zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: it says twice and three times.

original: nyungs na yang la las mi thos la /
analyzed: nyungs na yang la las mi thos la /
translated: If it is too little, some will not hear it.

original: mngas yang dus yol ba la sogs pa'i nyes dmigs yod pas /
analyzed: mngas yang dus yol ba la sogs pa'i nyes dmigs yod pas /
translated: If it is too much, there is the problem of the time passing and so on.

original: de'i phyir lan gsum ni ran par dgongs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir lan gsum ni ran par dgongs te /
translated: Therefore, three times is considered to be the right amount.

original: bshags pa dang byin gyis brlabs pa gnyis kyis ltung ba ma bcabs pa sha stag 'tshogs pa yin nam zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bshags pa dang byin gyis brlabs pa gnyis kyis ltung ba ma bcabs pa sha stag 'tshogs pa yin nam zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that the assembly is entirely of those who have not concealed downfalls through confession and through consecration.

original: chang mi sga bas brda byas pas /
analyzed: chang mi sga bas brda byas pas /
translated: The sign is that the beer is not sour.

original: dge 'dun lhag ma rnam par gzhag pa bsgrag par bya ba'i @79b mjug bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma rnam par gzhag pa bsgrag par bya ba'i @79b mjug bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: The conclusion is stated in order to proclaim the presentation of the partial defeats:

original: 'di la tshe dang ldan pa dag yongs su dag na 'di ltar cang mi smra bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di la tshe dang ldan pa dag yongs su dag na 'di ltar cang mi smra bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes gsungs te /
translated: “If there is complete purity in this, then it is thus that I hold it, since you remain silent.”

original: bshags pa dang byin gyis brlabs pa gnyis kyis ltung ba ma bcabs pa sha stag tshogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bshags pa dang byin gyis brlabs pa gnyis kyis ltung ba ma bcabs pa sha stag tshogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that the assembly is entirely of those who have not concealed downfalls through confession and through consecration.

original: dge 'dun lhag ma gdon pa bshad zin to /
analyzed: dge 'dun lhag ma gdon pa bshad zin to /
translated: The recitation of the partial defeats is finished.

original: // / da ni gdon pa bzhi pa ste /
analyzed: // / da ni gdon pa bzhi pa ste /
translated: Now, the fourth recitation is explained.

original: ma nges pa gdon pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: ma nges pa gdon pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: The recitation of the undetermined offenses is explained.

original: 'di phyir / sdom la /
analyzed: 'di phyir / sdom la /
translated: The summary is:

original: dben pa skyabs yod 'dug pa'o //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: dben pa skyabs yod 'dug pa'o //🔽zhes gsungs so //
translated: Alone, in a concealed place, sitting.

original: sdom la zhes bya ba'i dogs pa dang / tshig gi don ni snga ma bzhin no //🔽ma nges pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: sdom la zhes bya ba'i dogs pa dang / tshig gi don ni snga ma bzhin no // ma nges pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The summary is as above.

original: pham par 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed kyis chos gsum las gang yin pa ma nges pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang ltung byed kyo chos gnyis las gang yin ma nges pa'o //
analyzed: pham par 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed kyis chos gsum las gang yin pa ma nges pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang ltung byed kyo chos gnyis las gang yin ma nges pa'o //
translated: Indeterminate means that it is indeterminate whether it is one of the three: a defeating offense, a partially defeating offense, or a downfall that requires relinquishment, or whether it is one of the two: a partially defeating offense or a downfall that requires relinquishment.

original: de gnyis ka yang sdom la /
analyzed: de gnyis ka yang sdom la /
translated: Both of these are included in the summary:

original: dben pa skyabs yod 'dug pa'o //🔽zhes gsungs pa 'di'i khongs su 'dus te /🔽dben pa skyabs yod pa na 'dod pa byar rung bar stan la 'dug pa las ni /
analyzed: dben pa skyabs yod 'dug pa'o // zhes gsungs pa 'di'i khongs su 'dus te / dben pa skyabs yod pa na 'dod pa byar rung bar stan la 'dug pa las ni /
translated: In private, in a secluded place, or while seated.

original: ma nges pa dang por 'gyur la /
analyzed: ma nges pa dang por 'gyur la /
translated: This means that if you are seated on a mat in a secluded place or in a secluded place with a roof, it is indeterminate whether you have committed the first offense.

original: dben pa skyabs yod pa na 'dod pa byar mi rung bar stan la 'dug pa las mi ma nges pa gnyis par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dben pa skyabs yod pa na 'dod pa byar mi rung bar stan la 'dug pa las mi ma nges pa gnyis par 'gyur ro //
translated: If you are seated on a mat in a secluded place where it is not suitable to have sexual intercourse, it is indeterminate whether you have committed the second offense.

original: 'di gnyis ni gleng gzhi'i dbang gis /
analyzed: 'di gnyis ni gleng gzhi'i dbang gis /
translated: These two are included in the nidana section.

original: dge slong gis ma nges pa'i chos 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i gnas su 'dug par mi bya'o zhes bca' bar mdzad par zad kyi /
analyzed: dge slong gis ma nges pa'i chos 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i gnas su 'dug par mi bya'o zhes bca' bar mdzad par zad kyi /
translated: “Monks, you should not remain in a situation that would lead to such an indeterminate offense.”

original: ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa la ni yang na pham par 'gyur /
analyzed: ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa la ni yang na pham par 'gyur /
translated: But in the presentation of the offenses, it is said, “It may be a defeating offense,

original: yang na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur /
analyzed: yang na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur /
translated: it may be a serious violation,

original: yang na ltung byed du 'gyur bar ci rigs par sbyar te /
analyzed: yang na ltung byed du 'gyur bar ci rigs par sbyar te /
translated: it may be a downfall, or it may be a minor infraction.🔽”

original: ltung ba ste lngar gzhag pa la ni ma gtogs so //
analyzed: ltung ba ste lngar gzhag pa la ni ma gtogs so //
translated: This is not included in the presentation of the five classes of offenses.

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag ma nges pa'i chos gnyis po 'di dag ni zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa las 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni ma nges pa gdon pa 'di'i lung dbog pa bstan to //🔽ma nges pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag ma nges pa'i chos gnyis po 'di dag ni zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa las 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni ma nges pa gdon pa 'di'i lung dbog pa bstan to // ma nges pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Venerables, these two indeterminate offenses are found in the recitation of the Prātimokṣasūtra every half month.” This teaches the recitation of the indeterminate offenses.🔽Indeterminate offenses

original: gang yin gtol med pas ma nges pa'o //
analyzed: gang yin gtol med pas ma nges pa'o //
translated: are called indeterminate because it is not certain what they are.

original: 'di nyid kha na ma tho ba'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pas chos zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid kha na ma tho ba'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pas chos zhes bya'o //
translated: They are called offenses because they bear the characteristics of a downfall.

original: gnyis po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni pham par 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed kyo chos gsum las gang yin pa ma nges pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang ltung byed @80a * //
analyzed: gnyis po 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni pham par 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed kyo chos gsum las gang yin pa ma nges pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang ltung byed @80a * //
translated: These two are🔽from among the three: a defeating offense, a residual offense, and a partially🔽virtuous offense.

original: kyi chos gnyis las gang yin pa ma nges pa'o //

analyzed: des na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is called a downfall that requires confession and relinquishment.

original: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /🔽dge slong gos phrogs pa dang / brlag pa dang / tshig pa dang / rlung gis khyer ba dang / chus khyer ba slong bar rigs pas mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa /
analyzed: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni / dge slong gos phrogs pa dang / brlag pa dang / tshig pa dang / rlung gis khyer ba dang / chus khyer ba slong bar rigs pas mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa /
translated: Here, the actual downfall is defined as follows:🔽It is proper to request a monk whose robes have been stolen, lost, burned, blown away by the wind, or carried away by water to receive a set of robes.

original: khyim par gyur pa /
analyzed: khyim par gyur pa /
translated: He must be a human being.

original: srog dang ldan pa /
analyzed: srog dang ldan pa /

original: nye du ma yin pa las /
analyzed: nye du ma yin pa las /

analyzed: stod g-yogs smad g-yogs dang bcas pa / rung ba tshad las mi chung ba phrugs gcig las lhag par len na /

original: slong bar rigs pa'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: slong bar rigs pa'i spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
translated: If he receives more than one set of robes, this is the actual downfall that constitutes a downfall that requires confession and relinquishment.

original: 'di'i byed pa po yang mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa khyim par gyur pa srog dang ldan pa nye du ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i byed pa po yang mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa khyim par gyur pa srog dang ldan pa nye du ma yin pa'o //
translated: The agent of this downfall is a human being, a layperson, who is alive and is not a relative.

analyzed: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
translated: There are five limbs for this downfall:🔽The monk whose robes have been stolen, lost, burned, blown away by the wind, or carried away by water is worthy of receiving robes.

original: dge slong gos phrogs pa dang / brlag pa dang / tshig pa dang / rlung gis khyer ba dang / chus khyer bar gyur pa slong bar rigs pa dang / sbyin bdag mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa khyim par gyur pa /
analyzed: dge slong gos phrogs pa dang / brlag pa dang / tshig pa dang / rlung gis khyer ba dang / chus khyer bar gyur pa slong bar rigs pa dang / sbyin bdag mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa khyim par gyur pa /
translated: The donor is a human being, a layperson.🔽The robes are suitable, not unsuitable.

analyzed: srog dang ldan pa nye du ma yin pa dang / stod g-yogs smad g-yogs dang bcas pa /
translated: The robes are complete, not incomplete.🔽The robes are the right size, not too small.

original: rung ba tshad dang ldan pa las mi chung ba dang / stod g-yogs smad g-yogs dang bcas pa phrugs gcig gi mthar thug pa las lhag pa dang / len pa'o //
analyzed: rung ba tshad dang ldan pa las mi chung ba dang / stod g-yogs smad g-yogs dang bcas pa phrugs gcig gi mthar thug pa las lhag pa dang / len pa'o //
translated: The robes are not extra, not more than one set of the three robes.

original: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
analyzed: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
translated: If any of these limbs is missing, the downfall is a serious transgression.

original: slong par rigs pa'i spang ba ste bdun pa'o /
analyzed: slong par rigs pa'i spang ba ste bdun pa'o /
translated: This is the seventh class of downfall.

original: // spags pa slong ba'i spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /
analyzed: // spags pa slong ba'i spang ba'i gleng gzhi ni /

analyzed: mnyan yod na khyim bdag gza' bran gnyis shig 'dod pa la log par spyod pas /

analyzed: bu mo mngag gzhug ma zhig yod pa rtag tu brdegs nas /

analyzed: nye dags de tshor nas khyim bdag gzha' bran gnyis ci nas kyang skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dag la gnas par gyur pa de lta de ltar tshul khrims kyi bsngags pa brjod cing /
translated: Upāli heard about this and he praised morality in such a way that the two brothers, the householders, went for refuge and abided in the precepts.

original: tshul khrims 'chal ba'i bsngags pa ma yin pa yang brjod nas /
analyzed: tshul khrims 'chal ba'i bsngags pa ma yin pa yang brjod nas /

analyzed: des de gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag la gnas par byas so //

analyzed: de phyin chad de gnyis bu mo de la yang mi rdeg cing nye dga' la yang ras yug chen po gcig dbul par glengs pa bu mo de thos nas nye dga' la sbran pa dang / nye dga' der 'ongs te ras yug chen pa bdas nas phul pa dang des ma mgu ste /
translated: She was not satisfied with that.🔽She bought a good large piece of cloth from the market and made him give it to the poor.

analyzed: tshong 'dus nas ras yug chen bzang po nyos te dbul du bcug pa'i rin dus su ma 'khor nas /

analyzed: bu lon pas khyim bdag bzung ste / nyi ma la btags nas smod par byed / phyar ka gtong bar byed /

original: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
analyzed: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /

analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //

analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis spags pa slong ba dgag par dgongs nas snga ma bzhin du /
translated: Then, thinking to prohibit the solicitation of cloth, the Blessed One, as before,

analyzed: dge slong gi phyir khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pas gos kyi rin dag spags nas /

analyzed: dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'ongs dang / de la gos rung ba dus su bskon no snyam pa las /
translated: When the monk named so and so comes, I will give him appropriate cloth at the right time.”

original: de na gal te dge slong de la sngar ma bstabs par rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig byung ste /
analyzed: de na gal te dge slong de la sngar ma bstabs par rnam par rtog pa 'ga' zhig byung ste /
translated: If, in that case, the monk, without first informing him, has some thought,

analyzed: bzang po 'dod pa'i phyir khyim bdag gam khyim bdag gi chung ma nye du ma yin pa de'i gan du song nas 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pas bdag gi phyir gos kyi rin gang dag spags pa'i gos kyi rin de dag gis /
translated: and for the sake of wanting something good, goes to that non-relative householder or householder’s wife and says, “Venerable, with the cloth money that you have set aside for me,

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la /

original: bdag la gos rung ba dus su legs par bskon cig ces smras te /
analyzed: bdag la gos rung ba dus su legs par bskon cig ces smras te /

original: gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes @91a * //
analyzed: gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes @91a * //
translated: then if the cloth is finished, there is a downfall.

original: bca' ba mdzad de /
analyzed: bca' ba mdzad de /
